TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAgg
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(select=[$SUM0($f1_0) AS $f0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f1], select=[$f1, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS $f1_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[$f1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, MOD(HASH_CODE(c), 1024) AS $f1]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testMultiCountDistinctAgg
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(select=[$SUM0($f2_0) AS $f0, $SUM0($f3_0) AS $f1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f2, $f3], select=[$f2, $f3, COUNT(DISTINCT a) FILTER $g_1 AS $f2_0, COUNT(DISTINCT b) FILTER $g_2 AS $f3_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[$f2, $f3]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $f2, $f3, =($e, 1) AS $g_1, =($e, 2) AS $g_2]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, $f2, $f3, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, MOD(HASH_CODE(a), 1024) AS $f2, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f3]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggAndOneOrMultiNonDistinctAgg
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[$f1 AS EXPR$0, $f2 AS EXPR$1, CAST(/($f3, $f4)) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM($f2) AS $f1, $SUM0($f3_0) AS $f2, $SUM0($f4) AS $f3, $SUM0($f5) AS $f4]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f3], select=[a, $f3, SUM(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f2, COUNT(DISTINCT c) FILTER $g_0 AS $f3_0, $SUM0(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f4, COUNT(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f5]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f3]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, $f3, =($e, 1) AS $g_1, =($e, 0) AS $g_0]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, c, $f3, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, MOD(HASH_CODE(c), 1024) AS $f3]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggWithGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f2_0) AS $f1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f2], select=[a, $f2, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS $f2_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f2]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, c, MOD(HASH_CODE(c), 1024) AS $f2]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggWithAndNonDistinctAggOnSameColumn
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f2_0) AS $f1, MAX($f3) AS $f2, MIN($f4) AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f2], select=[a, $f2, COUNT(DISTINCT b) FILTER $g_0 AS $f2_0, MAX(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f3, MIN(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f4]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f2]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $f2, =($e, 0) AS $g_0, =($e, 1) AS $g_1]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, $f2, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f2]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSomeColumnsBothInDistinctAggAndGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f1) AS $f1, $SUM0($f2) AS $f2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, COUNT(DISTINCT a) AS $f1, COUNT(b) AS $f2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testAggWithFilterClause
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f2) AS $f1, MAX($f3) AS $f2, MIN($f4_0) AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f4], select=[a, $f4, COUNT(DISTINCT b) FILTER $g_0 AS $f2, MAX(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f3, MIN(b) FILTER $g_10 AS $f4_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f4]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $f2, $f3, $f4, AND(=($e, 0), $f2) AS $g_0, AND(=($e, 1), $f3) AS $g_1, AND(=($e, 1), $f2) AS $g_10]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, $f2, $f3, $f4, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, IS FALSE(=(b, 2)) AS $f2, IS FALSE(=(b, 5)) AS $f3, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f4]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testMinMaxWithRetraction
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[c, CAST($f1) AS $f1, CAST($f2) AS $f2, $f3]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, MIN($f3_0) AS $f1, MAX($f4_0) AS $f2, $SUM0($f5) AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[c, $f3, $f4], select=[c, $f3, $f4, MIN(b) FILTER $g_2 AS $f3_0, MAX(b) FILTER $g_2 AS $f4_0, COUNT(DISTINCT a) FILTER $g_1 AS $f5]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[c, $f3, $f4]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, $f3, $f4, =($e, 2) AS $g_2, =($e, 1) AS $g_1]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, c, $f3, $f4, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, MOD(HASH_CODE(a), 1024) AS $f3, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f4]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f2_0) AS $f1, MAX($f3) AS $f2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f2], select=[a, $f2, COUNT(DISTINCT b) FILTER $g_0 AS $f2_0, MAX(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f2]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $f2, =($e, 0) AS $g_0, =($e, 1) AS $g_1]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, $f2, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f2]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testFirstValueLastValueWithRetraction
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, FIRST_VALUE(c, a) AS EXPR$1, LAST_VALUE(c, a) AS EXPR$2, FIRST_VALUE(c) AS EXPR$3, LAST_VALUE(c) AS EXPR$4, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$5]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[$f1]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f2_0) AS $f1, MAX($f3) AS $f2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f2], select=[a, $f2, COUNT(DISTINCT b) FILTER $g_0 AS $f2_0, MAX(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f2]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $f2, =($e, 0) AS $g_0, =($e, 1) AS $g_1]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, $f2, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f2]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testAggWithJoin
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[c, b, d, a, a0, b0, c0]) StreamExecJoin(where=[=($f4, a0)], join=[c, b, d, a, $f4, a0, b0, c0], joinType=[InnerJoin]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, CAST($f1) AS b, CAST($f2) AS d, $f3 AS a, +(CAST($f1), 2) AS $f4]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, MIN($f3_0) AS $f1, MAX($f4_0) AS $f2, $SUM0($f5) AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[c, $f3, $f4], select=[c, $f3, $f4, MIN(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f3_0, MAX(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f4_0, COUNT(DISTINCT a) FILTER $g_2 AS $f5]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[c, $f3, $f4]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, b, a, $f3, $f4, =($e, 1) AS $g_1, =($e, 2) AS $g_2]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[c, b, a, $f3, $f4, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, b, a, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f3, MOD(HASH_CODE(a), 1024) AS $f4]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, $SUM0($f2_0) AS $f1, MAX($f3) AS $f2, MIN($f4) AS $f3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, $f2], select=[a, $f2, COUNT(DISTINCT b) FILTER $g_0 AS $f2_0, MAX(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f3, MIN(b) FILTER $g_1 AS $f4]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, $f2]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $f2, =($e, 0) AS $g_0, =($e, 1) AS $g_1]) StreamExecExpand(expand=[a, b, $f2, $e]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, MOD(HASH_CODE(b), 1024) AS $f2]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
